identity.name: Sector-17 Store
identity.vibe: Concrete & Color - Reflecting the Le Corbusier architecture of Chandigarh with vibrant market life.

headings.usage: Use for all H1-H6. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for paragraphs, inputs, buttons. Normal tracking.

public_home.description: Asymmetrical grid for discovery. Mix wide hero banners with square shop cards.

admin_dashboard.description: Dense, data-heavy layout. Sidebar + Main Content Area.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-11 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 shadow-lg shadow-primary/20
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/90 h-11 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.outline: border-2 border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-11 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-all

cards.shop: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm transition-all hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1
cards.product: rounded-lg border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm transition-all hover:shadow-md

inputs.search: h-14 pl-12 pr-4 rounded-full border-2 border-slate-200 bg-white/50 backdrop-blur-sm focus:border-primary focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary/10 transition-all text-lg shadow-sm

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons. Use 'Outfit' font for headings and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for body.
2. THEME: Implement the 'Concrete & Color' theme. Use Slate-50/900 for backgrounds, not pure white/black.
3. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components. Remove default rounded-md and use rounded-xl. Increase padding inside cards.
4. SEARCH: The search bar is the HERO. Make it big, centered, and floating on the home page.
5. CARDS: Shop cards should be image-first. Product cards should be clean and price-focused.
6. ADMIN: Keep the admin dashboard dense ('Control Room' grid) but use the same font family for consistency.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for mock data. Do not use placeholders.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
